articles.author: Victoria Kennedy
articles.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle first update adds full ray tracing on PC - Eurogamer
articles.description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle gets its first patch on Xbox and PC.
articles.content:
The first update for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is here, available across PC and Xbox.
Along with a variety of fixes, this update has notably added full ray tracing (with path tracing) for N… [+1557 chars]
